ComicInfo.Title: Spotlight: Storm Shadow
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
Once a warrior for Cobra. Then a soldier for G.I. Joe. But ALWAYS an Arashikage ninja, first and foremost! He's Tommy Arashikage and this is SPOTLIGHT: STORM SHADOW!
Living Legend Larry Hama and fan-favorite artist Andrew Lee Griffith once again team up for this special standalone story featuring the mysterious ninja in white. Also includes the first of five interconnected covers (issues #286-#290) by superstar artist Freddie Williams II (Batman/TMNT)!
